summary: H.R. 4090 aims to boost domestic mining and hardrock mineral production. It directs the Secretary of the Interior to assess economic impacts of mineral import reliance, identify priority mining projects, and review regulations hindering mining. The bill also mandates identifying federal lands for mineral exploration and directs efforts to accelerate geologic mapping. The overall goal is to increase domestic mineral production, strengthen supply chains, safeguard national security, and reduce reliance on adversarial nations.
